questions.question: What is the difference between VLE experiment and $$ \gamma_i^{\infty} $$ experiment?

answers.b: The quantity of 2 nd compound is very low in VLE
answers.c: The quantity of 2 nd compound is very low in $$ \gamma_i^{\infty} $$ experiment
answers.d: Equimolar mixture is needed in $$ \gamma_i^{\infty} $$ experiment

questions.question: What condition indicates that you should stop increasing the heating rate?

answers.c: When small increments in heating rate don't raise the temperature

questions.question: how should the heating rate be adjusted?

answers.b: Increase slowly and allow system to accommodate change
answers.c: Give constant change throughout the experiment
answers.d: Quick increase then decrease gradually until temperature stabilizesn
